abstract.original_text: Attempts were made to grow certain viruses in organ cultures of Fallopian tube. Influenza A S and B, parainfluenza type 2, rhinovirus type 2, ECHO virus type 11 and adenovirus type 7 were observed to multiply, but poliovirus type 1, a human "coronavirus" and rhinovirus type 3 did not.

sentences.segment_text: Attempts were made to grow certain viruses in organ cultures of Fallopian tube .
ECHO virus type 11 and adenovirus type 7 were observed to multiply ,
but poliovirus type 1 , a human `` coronavirus '' and rhinovirus type 3 did not .
